entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening.
